Title: Prohibits the use of credit checks for prospective tenants
Summary: Prohibits a landlord, lessor, sub-lessor, rental broker, real estate agent, or apartment rental clearinghouse from requesting from a potential lessee or a consumer reporting agency a consumer report for the purposes of evaluating a rental application; provides penalties for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the use of credit checks for prospective tenants
